EmailTemplate.name: VIP Close Case Email from Manager
EmailTemplate.subject: We’d Love Your Feedback!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
​
I am reaching out to gather feedback on your last interaction with your Senior Account Strategist, . It is important for us to ​collect your feedback to ​be sure that you are getting the best ​customer ​service possible.
If you would take one quick minute and use this link to fill out a quick 2 question survey regarding your recent experience with {!Case.OwnerFullName}, I would greatly appreciate your feedback!
Survey Link: {!Case.SSUserSurveyLink__c}
Molly McGuire Manager, Senior Account Strategists
